title: (x) Details Magazine font - designed by Hubert Jocham {Stephen}
content:
this forum rocks! i've been trying to find out what font family is used in Details Magazine (mag kinda sucks, but the font is sweet), apologies for the image quality.. help is greatly appreciated   
   
 ![details headline font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131005082415im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1472.jpg)
author: folkert

comments.content:
Hey Folkert. Welcome. We covered this a while back.   
   
Check [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131005082415/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/585.html?1017695317).   
   
Stephen
BTW, are you the Folkert from NewsToday.com?

thanks Stephen!   
i had never seen hubertjocham.de before - great stuff. oh, and yup, i'm from NT.
The thread us a broken link. Is there an update to where it is?
I am afraid that all those old threads with the ‘messages’ bit in the URL have gone the way of the dodo.
